name: College Life(Corona Edition)
description:
SYNOPSIS

You are a high school student who is at the start of a new chapter in their life: College! Now, it’s time to be an adult. You have heard the amazing stories that come after high school. You’re finally going to move out.

 Bye, Mom and Dad! That is, until….

Ping! A look at your phone and your heart sinks. An article comes out, published by your campus, “Nationwide Lockdown enforces the campus to stay closed. No in-person classes will take place. Classes will begin online…”

A worldwide pandemic breaks outright at the end of your senior year, robbing you off of all your dreams for college.

Suddenly, all of your much-anticipated plans are up in flames.

Just how will you survive…

COLLEGE LIFE (CORONA EDITION)?______________________________________________________________________________

GAME FEATURES

  • Customizable names
  • 2 love interests with 4 endings in total
  • ~19000 words
  • 45min - 1h gameplay
  • Original backgrounds and character sprites

______________________________________________________________________________

CREDITS

Special thanks to our dedicated team! Thank you for working so hard!
